Summary: triangular shape with red pulsing lights on corners
divs: Sighting Detailsjust pulled into my driveway at around 945 pm . was getting groceriesw out of the trunk of my car and was walking to front door of house and looked up and seen a triangular shaped object with 3 red lights, one light on each corner . no sound at at all . it was just above my treetops , i would guess maybe 100 ft off the ground . i noticed it when i was facing south and watched it in a steady slow pace head north east .i would estimate the sixe to be at least 50 ft from light to light . i posted on facebook what i saw and not but twenty mins ago someone east of crossville in kingston tn seen the exact same thing . described the exact same thing i just described. it was flying way to slow for any plane to maintain flight .
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Crossville
There were no other sightings in Crossville on or around October 10th 2013
